name: §a§nHaunt I
description: You can easily haunt your enemies with your Ghostly abilities

text: You can make your melee weapons appear invisible, making it hard for your enemies to know what hit them.
Any held melee weapons in your mainhand will not be rendered and thus appear invisible.
You can weaken your enemies as if a Ghost walked right through them.
When hitting a mob with your bare hands, you will heal for §a1§r heart and apply §cWeakness II§r and §cSlowness II§r for §c15§r seconds to the mob.

§a§nTerrify I

You can terrify your targets, giving them an immediate scare


§nExplanation§r:

[§a30 Second Cooldown§r]

When hitting a mob in §d§nPhantom Form§r, you will deal §a1.25x§r damage, apply §cDarkness§r for §c3§r seconds, and deactivate §d§nPhantom Form§r. Targets that are hit will enter §eFight or Flight§r, and will have §e3§r seconds to hit a Phantom Origin.

If they successfully hit a Phantom Origin within §e3§r seconds, the Phantom Origin will gain §cWeakness§r for §c30§r seconds.

If they fail to hit a Phantom Origin within §e3§r seconds, the target will gain §cFear§r for §c15§r seconds. If the target is in a light level of 7 or lower, they will receive §cFear II§r for the same duration.

§d§nPhantom Form§r will be temporarily disabled for §e3§r seconds.

§4WARNING§r: §a§nTerrify§r will try to jumpscare players.
